title: This Illustrated Man
description:
It's time to clear the docket! Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse talk about tattoos, chalkboards, dinner time, bad neighbors, jungle cats, and more! Plus a letter from a veterinarian about Madagascar Hissing Cockroaches! 

LINKS DISCUSSED IN THIS EPISODE:

  • "Danse Russe" by William Carlos Williams
  • It Feels Good to Be Yourself by Theresa Thorn
author: shows@maximumfun.org (John Hodgman, Jesse Thorn)
